tasks.title: Implement Chrome Extension Sidebar Integration
tasks.description: Develop the sidebar component for the Chrome extension, ensuring it can be embedded into the browser and toggled by the user.
tasks.details: Create a React component for the sidebar with a toggle button. Use Chrome's sidebar API to register the component and ensure it works across different Chrome versions. Implement responsive design for various screen sizes.
tasks.testStrategy: Test sidebar visibility and toggle functionality in Chrome browser. Verify that the sidebar appears correctly in different resolutions and browser versions.

tasks.title: Develop Tool Management UI
tasks.description: Create the user interface for managing tools, including search functionality and a list of available tools.
tasks.details: Design a search bar with auto-suggestions and a list view for tools. Implement tool enable/disable toggles. Ensure the UI is responsive and works well with the sidebar layout.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality with various keywords. Verify that tools can be enabled/disabled and that the list updates in real-time.

tasks.title: Implement Network Request Monitoring
tasks.description: Develop the network request monitoring feature to capture and display all network requests in the browser.
tasks.details: Use Chrome's devtools protocol to intercept and log network requests. Display requests in a list with method, URL, status, and time. Ensure compatibility with XHR and fetch requests.
tasks.testStrategy: Test request capture with different types of requests (XHR, fetch). Verify that the list updates in real-time and displays correct request details.

tasks.title: Develop Response Editing and Mocking Feature
tasks.description: Allow users to edit and mock responses for specific network requests.
tasks.details: Create an editor for response content, including headers, body, and status code. Implement saving of mock rules and automatic application to matching requests. Ensure rules are only applied locally.
tasks.testStrategy: Test response editing with various content types. Verify that mock rules are applied correctly and that they only affect local requests.

tasks.title: Develop Tool Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement search and filtering capabilities for the tool list to enhance user experience.
tasks.details: Add search filters by tool name, description, and status. Implement sorting options for the tool list. Ensure search is case-insensitive and supports partial matches.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search with various keywords and filter options. Verify that the list updates correctly and is sorted as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Tool Enable/Disable Toggle
tasks.description: Allow users to enable or disable individual tools from the tool list.
tasks.details: Add a toggle button next to each tool entry. Update the tool's status in local storage when toggled. Ensure the UI reflects the current status of each tool.
tasks.testStrategy: Test enabling/disabling tools and verify that the status is updated in the UI and local storage.

tasks.title: Develop Mock Rule Management UI
tasks.description: Create a UI for managing mock rules, including adding, editing, and deleting rules.
tasks.details: Design a form for creating new mock rules with request matching criteria, response content, and status. Implement editing and deletion of existing rules. Ensure rules are saved to local storage.
tasks.testStrategy: Test rule creation, editing, and deletion. Verify that rules are saved and applied correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Mock Rule Application Logic
tasks.description: Ensure that mock rules are applied to matching requests and that they override the actual responses.
tasks.details: Write logic to check each request against stored mock rules. Apply the first matching rule's response. Ensure that mock responses are only applied locally and not to the actual server.
tasks.testStrategy: Test mock rule application with various request scenarios. Verify that mock responses are applied correctly and that actual responses are used when no rules match.

tasks.title: Implement UI/UX Enhancements
tasks.description: Improve the user interface and experience for better usability and responsiveness.
tasks.details: Refine the sidebar layout, add tooltips for tool descriptions, and ensure the UI is responsive on different screen sizes. Optimize performance for large numbers of tools and requests.
tasks.testStrategy: Test UI responsiveness and performance. Ensure that all interactive elements work correctly and the UI is visually appealing.
